BuzzFeed|LA or NYC| Sr Software Engineer| ONSITE, VISA|

We have a dedicated Ads engineering team helping create amazing Ad products and Ad experiences for our users and advertisers alike. Our Optimization + Learning team is looking for a senior engineer that is strong on the backend (Python/GO) to further optimize, personalize and monetize our Ads experience. We've just taken on Programmatic ads this year, so there is lots of new things on the horizon for this team. This engineer will have a direct impact on the bottom line of BuzzFeed and lots of visibility within leadership teams.

Email recruiting at buzzfeed dot com for more info or visit the job page to apply: https://boards.greenhouse.io/buzzfeed/jobs/1283037?gh_jid=12...
